name: Sid Meier's Civilization II
summary: Civilization II is similar to the first Civilization, with some changes to the various units, civilizations, world wonders, tile "specials" and technologies. The graphics were changed from a top-down view to an isometric representation. The AI was improved as well, including the elimination of most random events by now making the computer player go through the same production requirements as the human player.
